title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 357 - Confidential Nature Of Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 357 - Confidential Nature Of Records

State Regulations
§ 357.1 - Nature of information to be safeguarded
§ 357.2 - Prohibition against disclosure of information
§ 357.3 - Basis for disclosure of information
§ 357.4 - Prohibition against improper use of lists of applicants and recipients
§ 357.5 - Procedures for safeguarding information maintained by the New York State Department of Social Services, local social services districts and other authorized agencies
§ 357.6 - Confidentiality policy and procedures manual

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 357

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20, 34, 136, 349-a, 373-a, 374-a, 378[a][2], [5]; L. 1997, ch. 436; L. 2000, ch. 145

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
